ED_Title: Necessity of ending the economic, commercial and financial embargo imposed by the United States of America against Cuba
ED_DecisionText: At its 72nd plenary meeting, on 11 May 2022, the General Assembly, on the proposal of Cuba, (footnote: A/76/L.54), decided to defer consideration of the item entitled “Necessity of ending the economic, commercial and financial embargo imposed by the United States of America against Cuba”, as well as the report of the Secretary-General, (footnote A/76/405) and to include the item in the provisional agenda of its seventy-seventh session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
